column2: Apartment for Rent in Udahamulla, Nugegoda
column6: Location is the key to desirability with a rental property. This flat property is in a superb location that will ensure its popularity with tenants. It is walking distance to Embuldeniya junction, Udahamulla bus depot, railway station, Jayawardenapura hospital, Maharagama and many more places which are to be visited in day to day life. An easy walk to supermarkets and cafes, Vegetable shops and fish outlets.  Additionally, the property is located closer to 119, 689, 259 bus routes. Small families will thrive with the Kindergarten, Primary and secondary schools all in close proximity, this is the perfect location.A solid newly built in 2004 home that's superbly specified for modern living Inside and out - on a sunny, up stair section in the 2nd floor with one large bed room, pantry cum living room and one modern bathroom. Ideal for a couple or a small family with one child. Furnished with all the necessary items. Double-garage and off-street parking. Hot water available with solar power. No need to pay for your electricity for hot water. A roof top section with a shrine room and nice sunny space can be utilized for drying the clothes etc. Owners are abroad. Ground floor and first floor are occupied by owner’s mature kind parents.
column7: 407/24 A, 5 th Lane, Samagi Mawatha, Udahamulla, Nugegoda 10250
